summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene are essentially the same compound, with Buta-1,3-diene being an alternative name for Butadiene. The text discusses the metabolism and exposure of Butadiene (BD) in relation to various factors affecting its uptake and internal dose in humans. The focus is on understanding the relationship between BD exposure and its metabolic effects, indicating that both terms refer to the same chemical entity in the context of toxicology and environmental health.
